mapper.select: SELECT m.id, m.status, m.type, m.title, m.sender, m.description, m.create_time, u.name AS userName, c.name AS className FROM message m LEFT JOIN USER u ON u.id=m.sender LEFT JOIN class c ON u.class_id=c.id WHERE m.receiver = #{id} and is_show_receiver=0 ORDER BY m.create_time DESC
